about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a Panamanian company specialized in tempered glass, aluminum, and stainless steel services. We have established ourselves in the national market thanks to the trust of over 40 commercial clients and a strong digital presence. We offer innovative and personalized solutions for residential and commercial projects throughout Panama.

history.title: Our Value Proposition
history.description: At Crystal Service JJ, we provide a comprehensive experience, supporting our clients from supply to complete installation, with nationwide coverage and guaranteed workmanship. We stand out for our technological innovation in solutions such as Smart Glass and automated systems, as well as for offering personalized attention and express service to meet the needs of every project.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.contactTitle: Have questions about our cookies policy?
cookies.contactSubtitle: Our technical team is available to explain how we use cookies on our website.

what_are_cookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit our website. These cookies help us improve your browsing experience and understand how you use our site.

types_of_cookies.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types_of_cookies.content: We use different types of cookies: Technical cookies (necessary for site functionality), analytics cookies (to understand site usage), preference cookies (to remember your settings), and third-party cookies (from external services like Google Analytics).

technical_cookies.title: 3. Technical Cookies
technical_cookies.content: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our website. They include cookies that allow us to remember your language preferences, theme settings (light/dark), and other basic configurations. They cannot be disabled without affecting site functionality.

analytics_cookies.title: 4. Analytics Cookies
analytics_cookies.content: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website. This information helps us improve site functionality and content. The data collected is anonymous and does not personally identify users.

third_party_cookies.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
third_party_cookies.content: Our site may use third-party services such as Google Analytics, which may set their own cookies. These cookies are subject to the privacy policies of these third parties. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies.

cookie_management.title: 6. Cookie Management
cookie_management.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. You can delete existing cookies and configure your browser to block future cookies. However, this may affect the functionality of our website.

mobile_cookies.title: 7. Cookies on Mobile Devices
mobile_cookies.content: If you access our website from a mobile device, cookies work similarly to how they do on desktop computers. You can manage cookies through your mobile browser settings.

policy_updates.title: 8. Updates to This Policy
policy_updates.content: We may update this cookies policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website.

consent.title: 9. Your Consent
consent.content: By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with the use of cookies, you can configure your browser to reject them, although this may affect your browsing experience.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our cookies policy or how we use cookies, please contact us through the means provided in the contact section.
